title: Saturday lecture: Medieval love and marriage
itunes:title: Saturday lecture: Medieval love and marriage
itunes:subtitle: Sally Dixon-Smith explores the history of romantic love and marriage practices in the Middle Ages. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
In the final talk from our virtual Medieval Life and Death Day event, historian Sally Dixon-Smith explores the history of romantic love and marriage practices in the Middle Ages. Historyextra.com/podcast 

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
